channel.title: Walking thru walls?
channel.description: I know people can go through walls with noclip.. but i want to know how to stop making NPC's walking through walls. like if you run away and hide behind a building or something instead of the npc going through the wall to get to you he goes around the building or just doesnt move. anything to stop the npc from going through walls. any idea? i saw a TuT on this but i lost it..

item.title: Walking thru walls?
item.dc:creator: @lmfaoown lmfaoown
item.description:
@lmfaoown wrote:

Can you give me a direct link to the world map? i know its spoon feeding but i cant find the search button LOL

Read full topic

item.title: Walking thru walls?
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

lmfaoown:

I know people can go through walls with noclip… but i want to know how to stop making NPC’s walking through walls. like if you run away and hide behind a building or something instead of the npc going through the wall to get to you he goes around the building or just doesnt move. anything to stop the npc from going through walls. any idea? i saw a TuT on this but i lost it…

There is a tutorial on rune server, search WorldMap.

Read full topic
